Rayen Guermazi
Student in 2nd year Computer Engineering at Université SESAME

+216 55 374 307
rayen.guermazi@sesame.com.tn
ErrayDineri
in rayen-guermazi-16a2a22b3

Education
2025-2026 2nd year engineering student, Université SESAME
2024-2025 1st year engineering student, Université SESAME
2022-2024 Integrated Preparatory Program
2022 Baccalaureate, Experimental Sciences, Highest Honors

Skills
Languages Python, C++, C, Java
Frameworks PyTorch, Hugging Face Transformers, NodeJS, Django, React, Selenium
Methodology & Tools Scrum, Docker, Git/GitHub, N8N, Postman, BurpSuite
Systems and environments Linux (Arch and Debian), Windows, WSL
Soft Skills Problem solving, Adaptability, Teamwork
Languages French (DALF C1), English (Advanced), Arabic

Experience
2025 Data Science and AI Intern, Get-Wireless, Tunis
Design and development of a full-stack web solution integrating AI models for assistance in radiological diagnosis, including medical image processing, data augmentation pipelines and secure deployment.
2024 IT Intern, LaCroix Electronics, Zaghouan
Technical support.

Projects
Insurance ChatBot with RAG pipeline and tool calls
Insurance ChatBot able to answer clients’ questions about BH Assurance products, about their contracts and claim statuses and to generate a quote on request.
○ Stack : Python, LM Studio, FastAPI, React, Hugging Face Transformers, ChromaDB

WhatsApp AI Agent
AI agent capable of reading and replying to WhatsApp messages supporting French and English.
○ Stack : Python, N8N, NodeJS, ollama

Customer Service Email Auto-responder by AI
Intent detection system and automatic response generation for incoming emails using LoRA fine-tuning and various prompt engineering techniques (few shots etc.)
○ Stack : Python, OpenAI API, NVIDIA NeMo

Certifications
CyberTalents Introduction to CyberSecurity
Cisco Cisco Certified Support Technician Cybersecurity

1/2

IT Specialist Python, Java
DataCamp AI Fundamentals, Data Literacy, AWS Cloud Practitioner
Kaggle Intro to Machine Learning
NVIDIA Efficient Large Language Model Customization

Leadership and activities
2025 – Present Project Manager — SESAME Junior Enterprise
Steering the Junior Enterprise project process: project design, task distribution and team supervision.
2024 – 2025 Active member — Securinets INSAT, Securinets TEK'UP
Participation in bootcamps, workshops and cybersecurity competitions.
2023 – 2024 Active member — IEEE SESAME Student Branch
Organization of hackathons and trainings.

Competitions and technicals
CyberSecurity Securinets INSAT Friendly (TOP 5 among 300+) • MiniCTF TEK'UP • Sparks MiniCTF • DarkestHour CTF
Identification and exploitation of Web vulnerabilities, forensic analysis and recovery of sensitive information etc...
Competitive Programming CodeForces • LeetCode • WinterCup INSAT • IEEE Xtreme 17/18 • IEEE TechX Yesist 12 (TOP 9)
Solving complex problems in an optimized way using algorithms ensuring minimal complexity.

2/2

Languages Python, C++, C, Java
Frameworks PyTorch, Hugging Face Transformers, NodeJS, Django, React, Selenium
Methodology & Tools Scrum, Docker, Git/GitHub, N8N, Postman, BurpSuite

Experience
2025 Data Science and AI Intern, Get-Wireless, Tunis
Design and development of a full-stack web solution integrating AI models for assistance in radiological diagnosis, including medical image processing, data augmentation pipelines and secure deployment.
2024 IT Intern, LaCroix Electronics, Zaghouan
Technical support.

Projects
Insurance ChatBot with RAG pipeline and tool calls
Insurance ChatBot able to answer clients’ questions about BH Assurance products, about their contracts and claim statuses and to generate a quote on request.
○ Stack : Python, LM Studio, FastAPI, React, Hugging Face Transformers, ChromaDB

WhatsApp AI Agent
AI agent capable of reading and replying to WhatsApp messages supporting French and English.
○ Stack : Python, N8N, NodeJS, ollama

Customer Service Email Auto-responder by AI
Intent detection system and automatic response generation for incoming emails using LoRA fine-tuning and various prompt engineering techniques (few shots etc.)
○ Stack : Python, OpenAI API, NVIDIA NeMo

CyberTalents Introduction to CyberSecurity
Cisco Cisco Certified Support Technician Cybersecurity
